description: This file defines a Flutter ChangeNotifier class 'FilterProvider' that manages and updates user-selected filter criteria such as hair color, race, religion, height, and weight ranges. It provides methods to toggle inclusion of options and to update ranges, notifying listeners of changes.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A class that manages filter criteria state and notifies listeners upon changes.

methods.name: criteria
methods.description: Getter that returns the current filter criteria.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Sets the filter criteria to a new value and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggleHairColor
methods.description: Adds or removes a HairColor from the filter criteria based on selection.

methods.name: toggleRace
methods.description: Adds or removes a Race from the filter criteria based on selection.

methods.name: toggleReligion
methods.description: Adds or removes a Religion from the filter criteria based on selection.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the height range in the filter criteria.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the weight range in the filter criteria.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the filter criteria to default values.
